Text.Value: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Were you alone when you died?
Dog... split us up... ran us through...
What were you doing in the village?
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis: A dialogue with the bugbear's corpse after a player killed him. 'Butters' is Buthir, the ogre he loves.
